results.title: Mechanical engineering
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows the many activities of the mechanical engineer in designing and constructing machinery of every kind. The student needs to be good at mathematics and science. Shows him involved in the study of technical drawing, principles of air conditioning, of refrigeration, internal combustion, jet engines and how they perform under various conditions.
results.description:

results.title: The Middle path
results.creator_credit: Geoffrey Barnes, Alan Bateman and ABC-TV (Australia)
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Journey into Thailand”.
Keith Adam presents this program which offers a visit to the small market town of Chom Thong which provides a glimpse of life in a Buddhist monastery. It shows how the monastery and the monks play a vital part in the day-to-day life of the town.
results.description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Journey into Thailand”.

results.title: Journalism
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A straightforward account of a sometimes over-glamorised profession. The copy boy carries out menial tasks; the cadet learns how to report crime, general, parliamentary, financial and sporting news. The erratic hours of work are shown to apply to radio and television journalism as well as to newspaper work, and the basic demands of the work are similar.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A straightforward account of a sometimes over-glamorised profession. The copy boy carries out menial tasks; the cadet learns how to report crime, general, parliamentary, financial and sporting news. The erratic hours of work are shown to apply to radio and television journalism as well as to newspaper work, and the basic demands of the work are similar.

results.title: Architecture
results.creator_credit: Citizen's Assurance, Mutual Life and Citizens' Assurance Co. and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
The architect is trained to understand the needs of people and how labour, machines and materials can create buildings which meet these needs. Although he may arrange for the help of special experts such as structural or lighting engineers he too must have a grasp of these technical matters.

results.title: Industrial chemistry
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Industrial chemists are employed in diverse industries, ranging from the production of soaps and detergents to plastics, petrol and paints. The chemist who has a suitable temperament and knowledge can also enter into the technical sales side.
results.description:

results.title: Medical technology
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
The medical technologist aids the pathologist, the biochemist, the bacteriologist and other medical practitioners in diagnosing disease in patients. The technologist may specialize in one of these fields in a large hospital or in smaller hospitals his work may be general. Study and training differ from state to state but work is generally obtained in a hospital first, and part-time study at a technical college toward a certificate or diploma is then taken. Advanced work and training may then be taken later.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
The medical technologist aids the pathologist, the biochemist, the bacteriologist and other medical practitioners in diagnosing disease in patients. The technologist may specialize in one of these fields in a large hospital or in smaller hospitals his work may be general. Study and training differ from state to state but work is generally obtained in a hospital first, and part-time study at a technical college toward a certificate or diploma is then taken. Advanced work and training may then be taken later.
description_for_label:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.

The technologist may specialize in one of these fields in a large hospital or in smaller hospitals his work may be general. Study and training differ from state to state but work is generally obtained in a hospital first, and part-time study at a technical college toward a certificate or diploma is then taken. Advanced work and training may then be taken later.

results.title: Electrical engineering
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
The provision of power supplies and telephone communications systems, plus the design and manufacture of electrical equipment. Gives an insight into the type of work covered by this career. The varied nature of electrical engineering, and the planning and estimating ability which are necessary, and the educational requirements are shown.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.

The varied nature of electrical engineering, and the planning and estimating ability which are necessary, and the educational requirements are shown.
